user_query: I'm organizing a team-building event for my company and we want to have a brewery tour. Can you recommend breweries in Austin that can accommodate large groups? Also, find us a team-building activity near the breweries. Lastly, suggest a restaurant in Austin that can cater to our group.

TaskList.description: Find breweries in Austin that can accommodate large groups.
Find team-building activities near the recommended breweries.
Find a restaurant in Austin that can cater for large groups.
